subject: [Announce] JUnit-addons Runner alpha 2 released
msgSnippet: Following the principle of release early, release often I made a new one of JUnit-addons Runner. Modifications include: - moved ResourceManager into the
messageBody:
Following the principle of "release early, release often" I made a new
one of JUnit-addons Runner.

Modifications include:
- moved ResourceManager into the runner package
- jdk 1.4 assert keyword is supported and handled as a failure
- cleanup the output

as usual: <http://junit-addons.sf.net>

enjoy

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir R. Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
